revised_title: Observations of the Solar Eclipse by J. Milner
tldr: Mr. J. Milner observed the solar eclipse of May 2 and recorded the time of the eclipse's beginning at Yeovil in Somersetshire. He used a quadrant with a 2-foot radius to make his observations. This information was communicated in a letter to Dr. John Allen, M.D., F.R.S.
